name: Relevant Trafik
overview:
Relevant Trafik is an interactive Design agency. They specialize in Social Media Marketing, Web Design/Development/Software solutions, SEO and Training.

Relevant Trafik was formed in 2007 and has been involved mostly in the Entertainment Industry providing interactive design solutions for film, Broadway and music.

The company was also voted top ten greenest company by Startup Nation in 2009.

Relevant Trafik is located in Los Angeles, CA where it is heavily involved in the programming community where it sponsors and is heavily involved in the local LAMP (Linux, Apache, Mysql, Pearl and PHP) development community. LAMP is about open source software and much of the development created by the company resides on the premise of using and developing open source software solutions.

WordPress, a popular open source website and blogging platform is used heavily by the company for blogs, websites ans social network development.
